All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    This is the class resposible for handling generic queries for each class of type T
    Client
    This class is responsible for modeling a Client
    ClientDAO  
    ClientParse
    This class is used to parse the String information read from the input text and generate a client with the specific data
    ConnectionFactory
    This class is responsible for establishing a connection with the database
    FileParser
    This class reads from the input file line by line and executes the proper instructions
    OrderItem
    This class is responsible for modelling the orders that a customer can make
    OrderItemDAO
    This class contains some specific queries used only by OrderItem table
    PdfBill
    This class generates the Pdf bill that each customer is receiving after placing an order
    PdfGeneratorClient
    This class generates the pdf format of all the clients currently in the database
    PdfGeneratorOrders
    This class generates the the pdf report of all the orders
    PdfGeneratorProduct
    This class is responsible for generating the pfd report of all the products in the database
    ProductParse
    This class is used to parse the input from the file and generate a Product with that information
    Products
    This class models the products that are currently in the storage
    ProductsDAO
    This class contains some specifiec queries used by Products class only
    Start
    This class represents the main function
    TotalOrder
    This class holds infomation about a customer and the total ammount it spend
    TotalOrderDAO
    This class contains some specific queries for the TotalOrder class
